title: Compute p-value for chi-square of mayor preference

content.prompt: Approximately what is the probability that the observed responses would be as far or farther from the expected responses if there is no association between age-group and preference?

topic.text: 8.6: Carrying Out a Chi-Square Test for Homogeneity or Independence

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Calculate a test statistic and find a p-value, provided conditions for inference are met.
